description: PM to launch Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana from Ballia PM to attend various functions in Varanasi Ujjwala Yojana: 5 crore women beneficiaries from BPL families to get free LPG connections over the n
caption: www.narendramodi.in
message:
Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana will be launched in Ballia. The scheme provides LPG connections to 5 cr women beneficiaries from BPL families. 

In Varanasi will distribute e-rickshaws & interact with beneficiaries. Will also meet prominent citizens of Kashi. Looking forward. 

Particularly excited to launch a scheme for environmentally friendly e-boats at Assi Ghat. These will help bring down pollution. http://www.narendramodi.in/shri-narendra-modi-to-visit-uttar-pradesh-on-may-1st-2016-450746
